oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.geojson.mapred

Class GeoJsonInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.geojson.mapred.GeoJsonInputFormat

  • public class GeoJsonInputFormat
extends <any>
    org.apache.hadoop.mapred.FileInputFormat for GeoJSON text files. Multi-line JSON is supported. By default the input format will search for feature objects , this can be changed by providing a different parsing type. Keys are the position in the file, and values are the GeoJSON text. The GeoJSON text is not validated during the parsing.
